title: Japan's surrender
brief_description: Documentary profiling the USA’s victory over Japan through atomic warfare during World War II and their eventual surrender signifying the end of the War. Edited by Eugene W. Castle.
description: Documentary profiling the USA’s victory over Japan through atomic warfare during World War II and their eventual surrender signifying the end of the War. Edited by Eugene W. Castle.
